mapper.select: select a.id, a.user_id, a.title, a.content, date_format(a.writedate, '%m-%d %h:%i') writedate, b.genre from board a inner join showdb b on a.showdb_id = b.id order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into board(user_id, title, content, date_format(writedate, '%m-%d %h:%i') writedate) values(#{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writedate})
